scenario: Simulates a real human browsing pattern with organic delays and natural path exploration on a website

patterns.pathSequence: mix of direct navigation (search) and exploratory (about, blog, contact) paths
patterns.behavioral: randomized delays, no rapid successive requests, natural typing pauses

reasoning: This mimics a human's unpredictable but organic browsing: a mix of intentional searches (e.g., '/search?q=...') and exploratory clicks (e.g., '/about', '/blog'). Delays vary widely (5s–30s) to avoid bot-like precision timing. No consecutive requests occur within seconds, and paths are not strictly sequential, reflecting real-world hesitation and curiosity.
